      • getTarget

        public Target getTarget()
                 throws InvalidConfigurationException
        Description copied from class: TargetFactory
        This method sets the properties for the target when it is configured from a properties file.
        This method is call when no parameters are set in the config file.
        If your class cannot be instantiated without parameter, please always throw an InvalidConfigurationException.
        Specified by:
        getTarget in class TargetFactory
        Returns:
        A instance of the Target.
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - Exception thrown when the given configuration is invalid.
